about_the_game:
In Shop manager: video game tycoon your uncle entrusts you with his video game shop. Your goal is to make it profitable so that one day you can inherit your business. He will visit you every week to give you advice and check that everything is going well.



The shop section

Sell video games, consoles, accessories, computers, etc... More than 200 items

Every day make a good order for the next day to satisfy your customers.

Clean your store, stop thieves, renovate the store, pay your bills, check your stock and set the price of items.

Compete with other stores, invest in advertising, launch promotions, activate the loyalty card.

Your actions have an impact on customer satisfaction.


The family section (option can be disabled)

Support your family's needs.

Pay the credit for your home and buy the furniture.


The development section (option can be disabled)

Hire up to 24 people for the development of video games.

Choose the working rules.

Transfer the money from the shop for the development part.
